Package base

package base
Core game classes for the JEST card game.

This package contains the fundamental classes that make up the game:

  • Game - Main game controller
  • Card - Abstract card representation
  • Deck - Card deck management
  • Player - Abstract player class
  • Jest - Player's won cards collection
  • Offer - Two-card offer during rounds
  • Round - Single round logic
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea
  • Class
    Description
    Card
    Abstract base class representing a card in the JEST game.
    Deck
    Represents the deck of cards used in the JEST game.
    Game
    Main game controller for the JEST card game.
    Game.TrophyType
    Trophy types based on card conditions.
    InputHandler
    Singleton class to handle all console input.
    Jest
    Represents a player's Jest (collection of won cards).
    Offer
    Represents a player's offer during a round.
    Player
    Abstract base class representing a player in the JEST game.
    Round
    Represents a single round in the JEST game.
